Struggle.NAME: Struggle
Struggle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Costs 1 more [R] for each card in your hand except this card.

Fury.NAME: Fury
Fury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard a random card in your hand.

Steel Force.NAME: Steel Force
Steel Force.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have 10 or more Plated-Armor. Deal !D! damage. Overflow - gain 1 Plated-Armor.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I do not have any Plated-Armor.

Heavy Crash.NAME: Heavy Crash
Heavy Crash.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your current Plated-Armor to All enemies. Remove all of your Plated-Armor.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I do not have any Plated-Armor.

Earthquake.NAME: Earthquake
Earthquake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 2 Vulnerable to All enemies.

Skull Bash.NAME: Skull Bash
Skull Bash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage. Gain Confusion. Exhaust.

Lash Out.NAME: Lash Out
Lash Out.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Exhaust.

Unstoppable Force.NAME: Unstoppable Force
Unstoppable Force.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses All Block. Deal !D! damage.

Overpower.NAME: Overpower
Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deals 6 damage. Strength affects Overpower !M! times.

Mangle.NAME: Mangle
Mangle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! HP at the end of each of its turns.

Overexert.NAME: Overexert
Overexert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Lose 2 Dexterity. Overflow - Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

Destructive Finish.NAME: Destructive Finish
Destructive Finish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You may discard up to !M! card to deal the damage an additional !M! time.
Destructive Finish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You may discard up to !M! cards to deal the damage an additional !M! times.

Feast.NAME: Feast
Feast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, Heal !M! HP. Exhaust.

Flying Press.NAME: Flying Press
Flying Press.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to twice your current Block. Exhaust.

Smother.NAME: Smother
Smother.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak. Overflow - Apply 1 Weak to all enemies.

Feint.NAME: Feint
Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have Draw-Reduction, gain [R] and Draw 1 card.

Charge.NAME: Charge
Charge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this card is played on turn 1, the damage is doubled.
Charge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage. If this card is played on turn 1, the damage is doubled.

Heavy Assault.NAME: Heavy Assault
Heavy Assault.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. If your Dexterity is less than 0, deal damage equal to the difference to All enemies !M! times.

Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. Gain 2 Draw-Reduction.

Perfected Blow.NAME: Perfected Blow
Perfected Blow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Activate the effect of Heavy Body.

Cascading Steel.NAME: Cascading Steel
Cascading Steel.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal !D! damage to All enemies. Overflow - gain !M! Artifact.

Apex Predator.NAME: Apex Predator
Apex Predator.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, All enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

Bulldoze.NAME: Bulldoze
Bulldoze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is Weak or Vulnerable, the damage is doubled. Lose 3 Dexterity.

Lunge.NAME: Lunge
Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain 2 Strength. Overflow - Gain 1 Strength.

Thunder Struck.NAME: Thunder Struck
Thunder Struck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to All enemies. All enemies lose 8 Strength for 1 turn. Overflow - All enemies lose !M! Strength for 1 turn.

Hysteria.NAME: Hysteria
Hysteria.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 2 cards. Overflow - gain Confusion.

Challenging Roar.NAME: Challenging Roar
Challenging Roar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Weak to All enemies. Overflow - Gain 1 Strength.

Breakthrough.NAME: Breakthrough
Breakthrough.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card for each of your Draw-Reduction. You cannot draw any additional cards this turn.
Breakthrough.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards for each of your Draw-Reduction. You cannot draw any additional cards this turn.

Slow and Steady.NAME: Slow and Steady
Slow and Steady.DESCRIPTION: If your Dexterity is less than 0, put !M! card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. Overflow - Lose 1 Dexterity.
Slow and Steady.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If your Dexterity is less than 0, put !M! cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. Overflow - Lose 1 Dexterity.

Blitz.NAME: Blitz
Blitz.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R]. If this card is played on turn 1, gain [R] [R] instead. Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.
Blitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Gain [R]. If this card is played on turn 1, gain [R] [R] instead. Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.

Call to Arms.NAME: Call to Arms
Call to Arms.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile and place it into your hand. Exhaust.

Cannibalize.NAME: Cannibalize
Cannibalize.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Gain [R] equal to its cost. Exhaust.

Improvisation.NAME: Improvisation
Improvisation.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Create a copy of a card in your hand. If this card is played on turn 1, gain [R].
Improvisation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. Create a copy of a card in your hand. If this card is played on turn 1, gain [R].

Pursuit.NAME: Pursuit
Pursuit.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy does not intend to attack, on your next turn, your attack damage is doubled.
Pursuit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to not attack, on your next turn, your attack damage is doubled. Overflow - Gain !B! Block.

Endure.NAME: Endure
Endure.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !M! Strength for 1 turn.

Bide.NAME: Bide
Bide.DESCRIPTION: On the start of your next turn, deal damage to All enemies equal to the damage you receive this turn. Exhaust.
Bide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On the start of your next turn, deal damage to All enemies equal to the damage you receive this turn.

Impenetrable.NAME: Impenetrable
Impenetrable.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Plated-Armor. Overflow - You do not lose Plated-Armor for !M! turn
Impenetrable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 Plated-Armor. Overflow - You do not lose Plated-Armor for !M! turns.

Battle Shout.NAME: Battle Shout
Battle Shout.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength, If this card is played on turn 1, gain 4 Strength instead.
Battle Shout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Gain 2 Strength, If this card is played on turn 1, gain 4 Strength instead.

Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
Accelerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. Gain 1 Dexterity. Overflow - Next turn, draw 1 card.

Bolster.NAME: Bolster
Bolster.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If your Dexterity is less than 0, gain !M! Plated-Armor instead.

Heavy Armor.NAME: Heavy Armor
Heavy Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain additional Block equal to your Strength times !M!.

Grapple.NAME: Grapple
Grapple.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. Whenever you play a card this turn, targeted enemy loses 3 HP.
Grapple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. Whenever you play a card this turn, targeted enemy loses 5 HP.

Inhuman Recovery.NAME: Inhuman Recovery
Inhuman Recovery.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Heal 3 HP at the start of your turn for !M! turns. Overflow - Heal 6 HP. Exhaust.

Mercurial.NAME: Mercurial
Mercurial.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Play the top card of your draw pile.
Mercurial.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Play the top card of your draw pile. Overflow - Exhaust a random card in your hand.

Taunt.NAME: Taunt
Taunt.DESCRIPTION: All enemies that do not intend to attack you lose all Block and lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

Hunker Down.NAME: Hunker Down
Hunker Down.DESCRIPTION: If your Dexterity is less than 0, gain Plated-Armor equal to the difference. Overflow - Lose 1 Dexterity. Exhaust.
Hunker Down.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If your Dexterity is less than 0, gain Plated-Armor equal to half of the difference. Overflow - Lose 1 Dexterity.

Focused Power.NAME: Focused Power
Focused Power.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for each of your Draw-Reduction. Exhaust.

Convert Flesh.NAME: Convert Flesh
Convert Flesh.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Increase your Plated-Armor by 50%. Exhaust.

Living Armor.NAME: Living Armor
Living Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated-Armor. Can be Upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.

Reversal.NAME: Reversal
Reversal.DESCRIPTION: Enemy has their Strength set to 0. Gain Strength equal to the Strength the enemy loses. Overflow - All enemies gain !M! Strength. Exhaust.

Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: Costs one less for each time you've taken damage this combat. Gain [R]. Exhaust.
Vengeance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs one less for each time you've taken damage this combat. Gain [R].

Brute Force.NAME: Brute Force
Brute Force.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] at the start of your turn. Lose !M! HP at the end of your turn.

Combat Training.NAME: Combat Training
Combat Training.DESCRIPTION: Every turn, the first 1 Upgradeable cards played are Upgraded after they enter the discard pile.

Inertia.NAME: Inertia
Inertia.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, you Retain your hand, except for Overflow cards.

Release Restraint.NAME: Release Restraint
Release Restraint.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 Strength. Gain 2 Dexterity. Gain [R] at the start of your turn.
Release Restraint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 Strength. Gain 2 Dexterity. Gain [R] at the start of your turn. Overflow - Gain 1 Dexterity.

Indomitable Will.NAME: Indomitable Will
Indomitable Will.DESCRIPTION: Weak has the opposite effect on you.
Indomitable Will.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Weaken has the opposite effect on you.

Overflowing Armor.NAME: Overflowing Armor
Overflowing Armor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Overflow is activated, gain 1 Plated-Armor
Overflowing Armor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Plated-Armor and 1 Block for each Overflow Card in your hand.

Atlas.NAME: Atlas
Atlas.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Overflow is activated, gain 1 Strength.
Atlas.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Strength for each Overflow Card in your hand. Overflow - Gain 1 Strength.

Shatter.NAME: Shatter
Shatter.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have Plated-Armor, lose 1 Plated-Armor and deal !M! damage to All enemies.

Spiked Armor.NAME: Spiked Armor
Spiked Armor.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Plated-Armor to enemies who attack you, at the end of their turn.

Natural Endurance.NAME: Natural Endurance
Natural Endurance.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn gain Block equal to your Strength.

Colossus.NAME: Colossus
Colossus.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Gain 8 Plated-Armor. You cannot gain Block from cards.

Slugfest.NAME: Slugfest
Slugfest.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies without Slow gain Slow for the turn. ALL Attacks currently in your hand cost 0 for the turn.
Slugfest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies without Slow gain Slow for the turn. ALL Attacks currently in your hand cost 0 for the turn.

Heavier Body.NAME: Heavier Body
Heavier Body.DESCRIPTION: Improve the effects of the Heavy Body Relic.
